name: 18 MINS of BIG MILITARY PLANES! Abbotsford Airshow Departures (4K)
description:
The Abbotsford Airshow is the largest airshow in Western Canada, and (usually) takes place every year in August. The 2023 show had a great lineup of aircraft on static and flying display, particularly with the U.S. Air Force bringing a B-52, C-5, KC-135, and C-17, in addition to their EA-18s (not in the video) F-35s, and F-15s.

I stuck around after the show the following Monday to catch some of these U.S. and Royal Canadian Air Force aircraft departing Abbotsford for their respective home bases. It's a rare opportunity (at least, here in Canada) to see so many military planes on the move in a short period of time like this, so I hope you enjoy!

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Thank you to RadarBox for supporting the creation of plane spotting videos on this channel! Find out more about them at https://www.radarbox.com/?referrer=AlexAviation

FLIGHT INFORMATION
00:00 - Introduction
00:19 - USAF F-15 Eagle (x2) to Portland (PDX)
02:03 - USAF B-52H Stratofortress to Barksdale AFB (BAD)
03:55 - USAF F-35A Lightning II (x2) to Hill AFB (HIF)
05:35 - USAF C-5M Super Galaxy to Travis AFB (SUU)
07:55 - USAF KC-135 Stratotanker to Peoria (PIA)
09:31 - RCAF CT-155 Hawk to CFB Cold Lake (YOD)
10:25 - RCAF CP-140 Aurora to CFB Comox (YQQ)
13:03 - USAF C-17A Globemaster III to McChord AFB (TCM)
14:13 - USAF A-10C Thunderbolt II (x2) to Boise (BOI)
16:31 - RCAF CF-18 Hornet (x2) to CFB Cold Lake (YOD)

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
